thread.title: Israel announces new steps to curb deadly knife attacks PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Israel announces new steps to curb deadly knife attacks | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Israel announces new steps to curb deadly knife attacks PBS NewsHour
text: Israeli officials announced new steps to curb a rash of deadly stabbings on its citizens, including enforcing roadblocks in Arab East Jerusalem. Eight Israelis have died in Palestinian stabbings and police have shot and killed 40 Palestinians in clashes. NewsHour Special Correspondent Martin Seemungal joins Hari Sreenivasan via Skype from Jerusalem.
